noun.description: A person who deliberately prevents the facts or full details of something from becoming known; an obscurantist.
examples: he is no pious obscurant wishing for a return to the days when issues were never discussed
smoke and other obscurants have been used in wars dating back to the ancient Greeks

adjective.description: Deliberately preventing the facts or full details of something from becoming known; obscurantist.
Having the effect of hindering visibility.
